amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Defense to take into consideration during the KC-X or any successor aerial tanker replacement program, any unfair competitive advantage an offeror may possess and to report any such unfair competitive advantage to Congressional defense committees within 60 days of bid submissions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 82 printed in House Report 111-498 to require the Department of Defense to take into consideration during the KC-X or any successor aerial tanker replacement program any unfair competitive advantage an offeror may possess, and to report any such unfair competitive advantage to Congressional defense committees within 60 days of bid submissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 8 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 8 (Roll no. 313).
